images.title: Notebook Orientation
images.caption: Key tools for effectively using notebooks. Sections grouped for later breakdown.

images.title: Notebook Naming
images.caption: Default names will be 'Untitled', be sure name them so you don't lose any work.

images.title: File, Edit, & View Menus
images.caption: Many features in these will be common to other apps. Note the cell operations in Edit-some keyboard shortcuts, like undo, may only impact the cell you're in!

images.title: Run & Kernel Menus
images.caption: Menu features useful options for some or all cells, clearing outputs, and interuptting the kernel (for when recursion goes wrong).

images.title: Settings & Help Menus
images.caption: Find docs, tips, & tricks. Be sure to customize your experience with themes as well.

images.title: Notebook and Kernel Shortcuts
images.caption: Notebook shortcuts give quick access to common functions. Use the cell-type dropdown to quickly produce the right content. Kernel menu provides crucial information on your environment.

images.title: Cell 1: Python
images.caption: Example code cell showing the syntax and resulting output once executed.

images.title: Cell 2: Markdown
images.caption: The second cell has the same input text, but is a Markdown type cell. Therefore, the return is formmatted text, not code results.
